name: 王玉瑞
objective: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原 理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺 陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物 理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度 、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
schedule:
Week 1, Introduction to Materials Science and Engineering
Week 2, Atomic structure and Arrangement of Atoms and Ions
Week 3, Defects in the Arrangement of Atoms and Ions
Week 4, Defects in the Arrangement of Atoms and Ions
Week 5, Movement of Atoms and Ions in Materials
Week 6, Movement of Atoms and Ions in Materials
Week 7, Mechanical Properties and Behaviors
Week 8, Mechanical Properties and Behaviors
Week 9, Midterm Exam.
Week 10, Strain Hardening and Annealing
Week 11, Strain Hardening and Annealing
Week 12, Principles of Solidification
Week 13, Principles of Solidification
Week 14, Solid Solutions and Phase Equilibrium
Week 15, Solid Solutions and Phase Equilibrium
Week 16, Dispersion Strengthening and Eutectic Phase Diagrams
Week 17, Dispersion Strengthening and Eutectic Phase Diagrams
Week 18, Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
1. 每週或隔週隨堂測驗為主(70%) 無期中期末考
2. 上課出席率及參與態度(30%)
materials: The Science and Engineering of Materials, D. R. Askeland, 4th edtion
